title: User Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid email and password and session is persisted.

steps.description: Click the Log In button on the home page to open the login modal
Enter valid email and password
Click login button
Verify that user is authenticated and redirected to home page or dashboard
Verify that session is persisted across page reload

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and proper error message is shown for invalid credentials.

steps.description: Click the Log In button on the home page to open the login modal
Enter invalid email or password
Click login button
Verify that login is rejected and error message is displayed

title: User Signup Success with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can sign up with valid email and password and complete profile.

steps.description: Click the Sign Up or Log In button and switch to signup tab
Fill in valid email, password, and required profile fields
Submit signup form
Verify that user account is created
Verify user is redirected to profile completion if required

title: Password Recovery Workflow Success
description: Verify user can request password recovery and reset password through link.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery page
Submit registered email for password reset
Verify confirmation message for email sent is displayed
Use received link to reset password
Enter new valid password and submit
Verify password is updated and user can log in with new password

title: Add Product to Cart and Verify UI Update
description: Verify that adding a product from product listing updates cart UI instantly.

steps.description: Navigate to products page
Select a product and add to cart
Verify cart count and contents update immediately in UI

title: Update Product Quantity in Cart
description: Verify that user can update product quantity in cart and UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to cart page or open cart dropdown
Change quantity of a product to a valid number
Verify cart total and product quantity update instantly

title: Remove Product from Cart
description: Verify that removing a product from cart updates UI and cart state correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to cart
Remove a product from cart
Verify product is removed from UI and cart count updates

title: Cart State Persistence with localStorage
description: Verify that shopping cart contents persist after page reload via localStorage sync.

steps.description: Add several products to cart
Reload the webpage
Verify cart products and quantities are persisted and loaded correctly

title: Checkout Process with Valid Address and Promo Code
description: Test checkout flow with selecting a saved delivery address and applying valid promo code.

steps.description: Add products to cart and proceed to checkout
Select a saved delivery address
Enter a valid promo code and trigger backend validation RPC
Verify promo code is accepted and discount applied
Confirm order creation
Verify backend order creation RPC succeeds and order confirmation page is shown

title: Checkout Process with Invalid Promo Code
description: Verify that invalid promo codes are rejected during checkout with appropriate error and no discount applied.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with products in cart
Select delivery address
Enter invalid promo code and trigger backend validation
Verify promo code is rejected with clear error message
Proceed to order confirmation without discount
Verify order is created successfully with correct pricing without promo discount

title: User Profile Order History Display
description: Verify that user profile page accurately displays past orders with correct details.

steps.description: Log in as user with completed orders
Navigate to Profile page
Verify order history list loads and displays correct order details

title: User Address Management - Add, Edit, Delete
description: Verify users can manage their address book with add, edit, and delete operations reflecting UI and backend.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile address management section
Add a new valid address
Verify new address appears in address list
Edit an existing address and save changes
Verify updated address changes are reflected
Delete an address
Verify address is removed from list and backend

title: User Password Update
description: Verify that user can update their password successfully from profile with validation and security.

steps.description: Navigate to password update page from Profile
Enter current password and new valid password
Submit password update
Verify password is stored securely and updated in backend
Log out and log in using new password
Verify login succeeds with new password

title: Admin Dashboard - Manage Orders List and Details
description: Verify Admin can view, filter, and manage orders from AdminOrders panel with real-time updates.

steps.description: Log in as admin user
Navigate to AdminOrders page
Verify list of orders loads with correct data
Apply filters (e.g., status, date range) and verify list updates
Open order details and update status
Verify order status update reflects immediately in UI and backend

title: Admin Dashboard - Manage Products CRUD
description: Verify admin can create, update, and delete products through AdminProducts panel safely.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to AdminProducts page
Create a new product with valid details
Verify new product appears in list
Edit an existing product's details
Verify product details updated correctly
Delete a selected product
Verify product is removed from list and backend

title: Admin Dashboard - Manage Users CRUD
description: Verify admin can view, edit, deactivate, and delete user accounts via AdminUsers panel.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to AdminUsers page
Verify users list loads with accurate data
Edit user details (e.g., roles, status)
Verify changes are saved and reflected
Deactivate or delete a user
Verify user is deactivated or removed from system

title: Admin Dashboard - Manage Promo Codes CRUD
description: Verify that admin can create, update, delete promo codes and changes impact checkout validation.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to AdminPromoCodes page
Create a new promo code with valid data
Verify promo code appears in list
Update promo code details
Verify updated details are saved
Delete promo code
Verify promo code no longer validates at checkout

title: Landing Page Loads Correctly
description: Verify that the public landing page loads with all expected components and UI elements.

steps.description: Navigate to root URL of the site
Verify landing page loads with visible reusable UI components like loaders, promotions marquee, GIFs, and cookie consent dialog

title: Invalid Routes Show Custom 404 Page
description: Verify that navigating to an unknown URL displays the custom 404 Not Found page.

steps.description: Navigate to a non-existent URL path
Verify custom 404 page is rendered with appropriate message and UI
